titles.title: Housing Assistance for Needy Families Act of 2003

A bill to better assist lower income families in obtaining decent, safe, and affordable housing through the conversion of the section 8 housing choice voucher program into a State-administered block grant.
Housing Assistance for Needy Families Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: Housing Assistance for Needy Families Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to States for tenant-based rental and first-time homeownership housing. Directs a recipient State to provide such assistance through block grants.Bases family eligibility for such assistance upon income and non-receipt of section 8 assistance (under the Housing Act of 1937), with a temporary waiver for a family currently receiving section 8 tenant-based or voucher assistance.Sets forth program provisions, including assistance portability.
